question: Accelerated Irrigation Benefit Programme was in news. Which of the following statements is true regarding AIBP? 1.AIBP was initiated in 2006. 2.The scheme is being implemented by the Union Ministry of Water Resources. 3.It is a Centrally sponsored scheme.
explanation: AIBP was initiated in 1996 as a Central scheme. The Scheme provides central assistance in the form of loan to State Government to complete those ongoing irrigation projects which were costing Rs.1000 crore.
